video.title: Gu Family Book
video.synopsis: A being born of a human mother and a mythical creature yearns to become a real human. Can a martial artist and archer help him on his quest?

episodes.synopsis: The guardian of Mt. Jiri travels around the human world; a man is wrongly executed for treason and his daughter, Seo Hwa, is sold into prostitution.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: After falling in love with Seo Hwa, Wol Ryung attempts to become human; Wol Ryung and Seo Hwa find wedded bliss; Kwan Woong searches for Seo Hwa.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Moo Sol adopts and raises Kang Chi, who grows, prospers  -- and gets in trouble; So Jung gives Yeo Wool unusual relationship advice.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: When Kwan Woong cannot get a room at the Hundred Year Inn, he resorts to violence, prompting Kang Chi to return and do battle with him.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Black shadows attack Kang Chi and Yeo Wool; Chung Jo and Kang Chi share their romantic feelings for each other; So Jung visits Kang Chi.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Kwan Woong’s atrocities enrage Kang Chi and force him into action; Kwan Woong falsely accuses Moo Sol of treason and Kang Chi of murder.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Yeo Wool witnesses Kang Chi's transformation, to her shock and his agony; Soo Ryun recalls Seo Hwa from 20 years ago and punishes Chung Jo.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Kwan Woong frames Kang Chi for murder and orders his execution; Chung Jo needs help when she is bullied by other workers at Choon Hwa Gwan.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Pyung Joon invites Kang Chi and Tae Seo to be his disciples; Jo Kwan Woong tries to solve a mystery about the inn; Soon Shin and Pyung Joon conspire.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: Kang Chi and Yeo Wool get locked in a room with treasure; Seo follows a hunch; Yeo Wool's scar ignites a memory from Kang Chi's childhood.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: Tae Seo asks Kang Chi to save the now-half-beast Chung Jo; the people at the Hundred Year Inn hear news that may aid Kang Chi with the rescue.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: Tae Seo tells Kwan Woong about Kang Chi’s whereabouts; Kang Chi accidentally shows his beast side; Seo gets a hunch about Kang Chi's origins.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: Quarrels occur when Yeo Wool takes charge of training Kang Chi; dead bodies that appear in the forest cause people to doubt Kang Chi.
episodes.title: Episode 13

episodes.synopsis: Kang Chi and Yeo Wool enjoy a lantern festival; a body with no liver is found, stirring more distrust of Kang Chi; Soon Shin's new plan is revealed.
episodes.title: Episode 14

episodes.synopsis: Wol Ryung tells Yeo Wool that Pyung Joon killed Kang Chi’s father; a strange rumor begins to circulate in town; Kang Chi is accused of murder.
episodes.title: Episode 15

episodes.synopsis: Wol Ryung advises Kang Chi to give up his dream of becoming human; when Wol Ryung disappears after an attacking Kong Dal, blame falls on Kang Chi.
episodes.title: Episode 16

episodes.synopsis: Kang Chi visits Wol Ryung to find the missing Yeo Wool and stages an attack to rescue her; Hong Myung wants to buy something from Kwan Woong.
episodes.title: Episode 17

episodes.synopsis: Hong Myung orders her people to find Kang Chi and kill him if necessary; Chung Jo asks Yeo Wool if she knows the identity of Wol Ryung's slayer.
episodes.title: Episode 18

episodes.synopsis: Hong Myung is shocked to learn that Kang Chi is her child; Kwan Woong tests Yeo Wool to see if she is really Seo Hwa; Yeo Wool plans to save Kang Chi.
episodes.title: Episode 19

episodes.synopsis: Wol Ryung becomes a 1,000-year-old demon; Kwan Woong makes a deal with Wol Ryung at Seo Hwa's expense; Pyung Joon engages Kang Chi in a duel.
episodes.title: Episode 20

episodes.synopsis: Wol Ryung attacks Kang Chi during a bout of amnesia; Hong Myung meets Soon Shin and hands him the list of officials who are taking bribes.
episodes.title: Episode 21

episodes.synopsis: When Kang Chi visits So Jung and reveals his love for Yeo Wool, So Jung cautions him about their shocking fate; Pil Mok captures Tae Seo.
episodes.title: Episode 22

episodes.synopsis: Despite Yeo Wool's protests, Kang Chi tries to spare her by saying good-bye. To make matters worse, Yeo Wool is then attacked by a mysterious being.
episodes.title: Episode 23

episodes.synopsis: When Kwan Woong shoots Yeo Wool, Kang Chi tracks him down; Yeo Wool tells Kang Chi her three dying wishes; Chung Jo visits Kwan Woong in prison.
episodes.title: Episode 24
